notesStmt.note: A translation, by Sir Tobie Matthew, of part 2, treatise 3 of: Rodriguez, Alonso. Ejercicio de perfección y virtudes cristianas.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of STC 21145.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
